message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $975,000. This reflects its worth while still acknowledging your interest.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with our mutual interests.
